title: DFG, German Research Foundation - Announcement and Date Notification: DFG Annual Meeting to Take Place from 30 June to 2 July 2025 in Hamburg
snippet: For the formal ceremony on Tuesday, 1 July, starting at 6 pm at Altonaer Fischauktionshalle, guests include Federal Research Minister Dorothee Bär and Hamburg’s Senator for Science, Maryam Blumenthal. In her speech, DFG President Katja Becker will also take the opportunity to address the growing global threat to the freedom of research.
